mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_SN = #{menuSn}
SELECT * FROM TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS ORDER BY MENU_SN DESC LIMIT #{skip} , #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TC_ADMIN_MENU_LS (MENU_SN, SUPI_MENU_SN, MENU_NM, MENU_URL, DEPT, ORDR, USE_YN, DSP_YN, REG_DATE, REG_SN, MOD_DATE, MOD_SN) VALUES (#{menuSn}, #{supiMenuSn}, #{menuNm}, #{menuUrl}, #{dept}, #{ordr}, #{useYn}, #{dspYn}, #{regDate}, #{regSn}, #{modDate}, #{modSn})
